name: IBM Cloud Private Single Node Installation on OpenStack
description: This template will deploy a single Node instance of IBM Cloud Private on OpenStack

metadata.displayName: Single Node Deployment of IBM Cloud Private Single on OpenStack
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy a single Node instance of IBM Cloud Private on OpenStack

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
  2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Cloud Private - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSBS6K/product_welcome_cloud_private.html
  3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
